name: Bridges (Benjamin.Phillips)
description:
This project was made initially as part of a personal experience based assessment.

 It ended up as an avenue for me to deal with some stuff that I'd been neglecting to deal with. 

Ultimately, this is a piece of my past that I wanted to finally get through. It took me a while to get to it. But, now it's there, and I hope it helps in some way!

Game Designed and Created by Benjamin Phillips
https://twitter.com/Benn7495


I know sometimes things get really hard. It doesn't quite feel like anyone gets it, and feeling isolated becomes your new norm. 

When I was dealing with those feelings, I found a few things that helped me. Sometimes just externalising your feelings can make a world of difference.

A few places I found some help are below - 

https://www.lifeline.org.au/
13 11 14

https://www.beyondblue.org.au/the-facts/suicide-prevention
1300 22 4636

https://suicidepreventionlifeline.org/talk-to-someone-now/
1800 273 8255
